definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
Tanegashima, Japanese Island off Kyushu, the Japanese space launch site

sentences.english: The result is, that it is not necessary to use gibberlin acid.
sentences.chinese: 实验结果是，种子不必经过酸处理也可以发芽。

sentences.english: The positive side effect is, that the seed of Roridula can be stored for many years.
sentences.chinese: 这个特性，可以让捕虫树的种子保存数年。

sentences.english: The cost of seeds per mu could save 500 yuan and the total cost be half.
sentences.chinese: 每亩可节约种子费500多元，工本费可节省一半。

sentences.english: Scientists conducted genetic tests on thousands of maize seed and leaf samples.
sentences.chinese: 科学家对数千份千玉米种子和叶的样本进行遗传测试。

sentences.english: He is the sower of the good seed.
sentences.chinese: 他就是撒好种子的那位。

sentences.english: Part of every crop is saved for seed.
sentences.chinese: 每一种庄稼都留一部分成作种子。

sentences.english: The importance and vulnerability of seed banks have become apparent in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 种子银行的重要性和脆弱性近几年来已很明显。

sentences.english: Encased at the tip of each 25-foot-long rod are seeds provided by China’s Kunming Institute of Botany.
sentences.chinese: 每个25长的突触顶端嵌有由昆明植物园提供的种子。

sentences.english: They treat their seeds with a fungicide to combat seedling diseases.
sentences.chinese: 真菌剂浸泡种子来防止秧苗受病。

sentences.english: Seeds are open - minded, drink a heaven-sent "holy water."
sentences.chinese: 种子们放开胸怀，畅饮着天赐的“圣水”。

sentences.english: The seed corn was given me.
Rice, cotton and vegetable seeds are sometimes grown in special seedbeds.
sentences.chinese: 有时，大米，棉花和蔬菜种子要在苗床培育。

sentences.english: The dormancy of seed of M. robusta is broke if stratified for 80 days.
sentences.chinese: 低温层积80天即可解除八棱海棠种子休眠。

sentences.english: Hides the surface fragrance with Austria peucedamum politics plant's and so on cushion fragrance and smelly peucedamum seeds.
sentences.chinese: 藏面香和奥前胡政茵香和臭前胡等植物的种子。

sentences.english: I say love, it is a flower, And you, its only seed.
sentences.chinese: 我说爱，它是一朵花而你，就是它唯一的种子。

definition: fruit (produced by a plant)/(fig.) fruits (of success etc)/results/gains
